version_description: Some bug fixes in order to prepare for the 1.1 version.

You can now get all the details of your battery pack :)

You can access directly from the app all the raw data, including battery health, battery temperature, BMS version, number of charging cycles, as well as cell per cell voltage. This will enable you to check that your scooter's battery is in perfect health, or help diagnose battery issues.

- Finally, we support the imperial system :) You can show your speed and trip length in miles
- New "scooter" tab, with more details about your scooter (odometer, firmware version, ...)
- Better display of "trip time" in the front page (we use the scooter uptime instead of the time the engine was running)
- Fixing some bugs
Mainly changes behind the hood â€” rewrote all the core engine, including all the Bluetooth communication code, this version should be more stable and quicker :)
This version should fix some crashes that were sadly introduced in the last version
This version fixes a crash when connecting to some scooters

- The speedometer has been completely rewritten : the app will use less battery, less CPU and is faster in general. This was long overdue :)
- When showing Bluetooth devices, the app will not show devices that for sure are not scooters, it's easier to connect to your scooter, less noise in the device list (thanks Oleg :) )
Supports firmware 1.5.1 (BLE 0.8.1). It doesn't work yet with firmware >= 1.5.4 (BLE 0.9.1).
Fixes a bug in the previous version where the phone was going to sleep while using the app
Fixes some issues with M365 Pro
Add support for M365 BLE091 (firmware 1.5.4/1.5.6), and M365 Pro BLE110 (firmware 1.6.6/1.6.8)
Add the ability to set the cruise control, to lock/unlock the scooter, and to set the back light.

A bug in the backlight feature has been fixed.

The version 1.5.* bring a new premium plan (as well as very small ads) in order to support the development of the application.
Add the ability to set the strength of the regenerative braking
